head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TITLE, HOWARD PAUL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TITLE, HOWARD PAUL

block.p: TITLE--Howard Paul, 70. Died peacefully on January 7, 2007. Beloved husband of Dorrit (nee Bauer) for 47 years. Loving father of Karin (Anton Gross), Amy, Rebecca (Jonathan Aretsky). Dear brother to Marvin (Barbara). Devoted grandfather of Liam, Adam, Jacob. Cherished uncle, grand uncle, cousin, and friend. Art Director in advertising, humanitarian. We love you always. The Title Family
